DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center study evaluate effect DR-2011 compare progesterone gel woman undergo vitro fertilization fresh egg . The overall study duration approximately 12 month involve ovarian suppression/stimulation protocol well egg retrieval .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Evaluate Efficacy Safety DR-2011 In Vitro Fertilization
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal , age 1842 old time consent At least one cycle without fertility medication prior screen Tubal , idiopathic , male factor , ovulatory dysfunction endometriosis link infertility Semen analysis ( frozen sperm , include donor sperm , may use , long test do time freeze meet standard criterion ) Others indicate FDAapproved protocol Any contraindication progesterone therapy BMI > 38 kg/m2 Clinically significant gynecologic pathology ( example : submucosal fibroid , abnormal uterine cavity , others ) History 1 fail fresh IVF cycle More 2 consecutive clinical miscarriage ( gestational sac observe ultrasound ) Others indicate FDAapproved protocol
